mapper.select: select b.id from price_contract_item a inner JOIN price_dispatch_template b on a.template_id=b.template_code and b.del_flag=0 where a.contract_code=#{contractCode} and a.subject_id=#{subjectId} and a.del_flag='0'
select id from price_dispatch_template where template_type = 'S' and del_flag = '0' and deliver = #{subjectId} and customerId = #{customerId}
select id from price_dispatch_template where template_type = 'S' and 1=1 and del_flag = '0' and deliver = #{subjectId} and customerId = #{customerId}

select RTRIM(province_id) from price_dispatch_detail where 1=1 and del_flag='0' and template_id=( select id from price_dispatch_template where template_type = 'S' and 1=1 and del_flag = '0' and deliver =#{subjectId} and customerId = #{customerId}) and start_warehouse_id=#{wareHouseId}

select b.price_type from price_contract_item a inner JOIN price_dispatch_template b on a.template_id=b.template_code and b.del_flag=0 where a.contract_code=#{contractCode} and a.subject_id=#{subjectId} and a.del_flag='0' limit 1
select price_type from price_dispatch_template where customerId=#{customerId} and deliver=#{subjectId} and template_type = 'S' and del_flag='0'
